title: Coronation Street spoilers: Sinead dies tonight
text:
Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) forgave husband Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) after he kissed Bethany Platt (Lucy) Fallon) earlier in the week in Coronation Street, and tonight’s emotional episode will see the young woman pass away surrounded by those who mean the most to her.

There was conflict aplenty earlier in the week, as — after an argument with Sinead — Daniel found himself inconsolable and ended up kissing Bethany. When Sinead discovered the truth, she was devastated — as were Beth (Lisa George) and Craig (Colson Smith) — but, after having time to think, Sinead came to the realisation that she didn’t have time to argue, and thus she decided to forgive her husband — before informing him that he is and always will be her home.

Viewers have seen Sinead make a series of videos for son Bertie in an attempt to demonstrate just how much she loves him but tonight, her condition worsens, and Dr Gaddas comes to realise that she’s now too ill to move to a hospice.

As a result of the doctor’s comments, Sinead’s family gather by her beside and she takes delight in listening to them bicker over silly little things.

Later — realising how little time they have left together— she shares a special few moments with Daniel.

Before long, Sinead passes away with both Daniel and Bertie by her side.

Coronation Street airs a special hour-long episode tonight at 7:30pm

description: After a battle with cancer, Sinead passes away surrounded by her loved ones in tonight's episode.
